00033         public static String getHtmlCode(PromptViewerData promptData)
00034 
00035         {
00036                 AbstractOrmEntity ormEntity = null;
00037                 String html = "";
00038                 AbstractEntity data = promptData.getData();
00039 
00040                 if (data instanceof AbstractOrmEntity)
00041                         ormEntity = (AbstractOrmEntity) (data);
00042 
00043                 html += "<form method=\"post\" action=\""
00044                                 + promptData.getButtonAction().getUrlParam() + "\">";
00045 
00046                 html += "<table>";
00047 
00048                 for (Field<?> field : promptData.getData().getFields())
00049                 {
00050                         if (promptData.isReadOnly())
00051                                 field.setReadOnly(true);
00052 
00053                         ListOfValue listOfValue = promptData.getData().tryMatchListOfValue(
00054                                         field.getShortName());
00055 
00056                         if (listOfValue == null)
00057                         {
00058                                 html += "\n<tr><td>" + field.getName() + ": </td><td>"
00059                                                 + FieldViewer.getHtmlCode(field) + "</td></tr>";
00060                         }
00061                         else
00062                         {
00063                                 html += "<tr><td>"
00064                                                 + SelectBoxViewer.getHtmlCode(listOfValue, field
00065                                                                 .getShortName(), field.getDataString(), field
00066                                                                 .isReadOnly()) + "</td></tr>";
00067                         }
00068 
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 if (data instanceof AbstractOrmEntity)
00072                 {
00073                         if (ormEntity != null)
00074                         {
00075                                 for (GateWay gateWay : ormEntity.getGateWayList())
00076                                 {
00077                                         try
00078                                         {
00079                                                 AbstractOrmEntity externalEntity = GateWayManager
00080                                                                 .getExternalEntity(gateWay, ormEntity);
00081 
00082                                                 html += "\n<tr><td>"
00083                                                                 + externalEntity.getNaturalKeyName()
00084                                                                 + ": </td><td>"
00085                                                                 + externalEntity.getNaturalKeyDescription()
00086                                                                 + "</td></tr>";
00087                                         } catch (Exception e)
00088                                         {
00089                                                 // Catch vide lorsqu'on essaie de passer par une entité
00090                                                 // qui n'existe pas encore pour accéder à un accesseur
00091                                                 // secondaire
00092                                         }
00093                                 }
00094 
00095                                 for (FlagPool flagPool : ormEntity.getPositiveFlagPoolList()
00096                                                 .values())
00097                                 {
00098                                         flagPool.query(ormEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(), ormEntity
00099                                                         .getPrimaryKeyValue());
00100                                         html += "<tr><td colspan=\"2\">"
00101                                                         + CheckListViewer.getHtmlCode(flagPool)
00102                                                         + "</td></tr>";
00103                                 }
00104                         }
00105 
00106                         if (promptData.getComplementaryInfoLineList().size() > 0)
00107                         {
00108                                 html += "<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><ul>";
00109                                 html += "<div class=\"checkList\">";
00110 
00111                                 html += "<h3>Information complémentaire</h3>";
00112 
00113                                 for (String complementaryInfo : promptData
00114                                                 .getComplementaryInfoLineList())
00115                                 {
00116                                         html += "<li>" + complementaryInfo + "</li>";
00117                                 }
00118 
00119                                 html += "</div>";
00120 
00121                                 html += "</ul></td></tr>";
00122                         }
00123 
00124                         html += getSingleAccessorLinkList((AbstractOrmEntity) data,
00125                                         promptData.isReadOnly());
00126                         html += getMultipleAccessorLinkList((AbstractOrmEntity) data,
00127                                         promptData.isReadOnly());
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 html += "<tr><td colspan=\"2\" align=\"center\" class=\"submitButton\">";
00131 
00132                 if (!promptData.isReadOnly())
00133                         html += "<input class=\"submitButton\" type=\"submit\" name=\"submit\" value=\""
00134                                         + promptData.getButtonAction().getName() + "\" />";
00135 
00136                 html += "</td></tr>";
00137                 html += "</table>";
00138 
00139                 html += "</form>";
00140 
00141                 return html;
00142         }

00144         private static String getMultipleAccessorLinkList(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00145                         boolean isReadOnly)
00146         {
00147                 String html = "";
00148 
00149                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor;
00150 
00151                 ScrollList scrollList;
00152 
00153                 String actionName;
00154 
00155                 if (isReadOnly)
00156                         actionName = "Get";
00157                 else
00158                         actionName = "Edit";
00159 
00160                 for (String accessorName : entity.getPluralAccessorList().keySet())
00161                 {
00162                         pluralAccessor = entity.getPluralAccessorList().get(accessorName);
00163 
00164                         if (pluralAccessor == null)
00165                                 continue;
00166 
00167                         scrollList = new ScrollList(pluralAccessor
00168                                         .getInternalEntityDefinition().getVisibleName()
00169                                         + "(s)");
00170 
00171                         ActionLink titleActionLink = new ActionLink("", new BaseAction(
00172                                         "GetList", pluralAccessor.getInternalEntityDefinition()));
00173                         String titleUrlLinkHtml = LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(titleActionLink);
00174 
00175                         if (titleUrlLinkHtml.length() > 0)
00176                                 scrollList.setTitleUrl(titleActionLink.getUrl());
00177                         else
00178                                 scrollList.setTitleUrl(null);
00179 
00180                         for (AbstractOrmEntity currentForeignEntity : pluralAccessor)
00181                         {
00182 
00183                                 scrollList.addLink(currentForeignEntity
00184                                                 .getNaturalKeyDescription(), Servlet.makeLink(
00185                                                 currentForeignEntity.getCurrentModule(),
00186                                                 new BaseAction(actionName, currentForeignEntity))
00187                                                 + "?"
00188                                                 + currentForeignEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()
00189                                                 + "="
00190                                                 + currentForeignEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         if (pluralAccessor.getInternalEntityDefinition().getFields()
00194                                         .containsFieldName(entity.getForeignKeyName())
00195                                         && entity.getPrimaryKeyValue() != 0)
00196                         {
00197                                 if (!isReadOnly)
00198                                 {
00199                                         ActionLink newItemActionLink = new ActionLink(
00200                                                         "<img src='/file/images/plusIcon.gif' alt='Nouveau' style='display:block;margin-left:3px;margin-top:2px' />",
00201                                                         new BaseAction("New", pluralAccessor
00202                                                                         .getInternalEntityDefinition()));
00203                                         newItemActionLink.addParameters(entity.getForeignKeyName(),
00204                                                         entity.getPrimaryKeyValue().toString());
00205                                         scrollList.addActionLink(newItemActionLink);
00206                                 }
00207                         }
00208 
00209                         html += "<tr><td style=\"column-span: all;\" colspan=\"100%\">"
00210                                         + ScrollListViewer.getHtmlContent(scrollList)
00211                                         + "</td></tr>";
00212                 }
00213 
00214                 return html;
00215         }
00216 
00217         private static String getSingleAccessorLinkList(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00218                         boolean isReadOnly)
00219         {
00220                 String html = "";
00221 
00222                 String actionName;
00223 
00224                 if (isReadOnly)
00225                         actionName = "Get";
00226                 else
00227                         actionName = "Edit";
00228 
00229                 ScrollList scrollList = new ScrollList("Est associé à");
00230 
00231                 AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity;
00232                 for (String accessorName : entity.getSingleAccessorList().keySet())
00233                 {
00234                         foreignEntity = entity.getSingleAccessorList().get(accessorName);
00235 
00236                         String listLinkName = foreignEntity.getVisibleName();
00237 
00238                         String entityLinkName = foreignEntity.getNaturalKeyDescription();
00239 
00240                         String entityUrl = Servlet.makeLink(foreignEntity
00241                                         .getCurrentModule(), new BaseAction(actionName,
00242                                         foreignEntity))
00243                                         + "?"
00244                                         + foreignEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()
00245                                         + "="
00246                                         + foreignEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue();
00247 
00248                         String listUrl = Servlet.makeLink(foreignEntity.getCurrentModule(),
00249                                         new BaseAction("GetList", foreignEntity));
00250 
00251                         scrollList.addLinkGroup(listLinkName, listUrl, entityLinkName,
00252                                         entityUrl);
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 if (entity.getSingleAccessorList().size() > 0)
00256                         html += "<tr><td style=\"column-span: all;\" colspan=\"100%\">"
00257                                         + ScrollListViewer.getHtmlContent(scrollList)
00258                                         + "</td></tr>";
00259 
00260                 return html;
00261         }
